translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 陣は混乱状態に陥った。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: The formation fell into a state of confusion.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「なっ……何だぁ！？」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Wha... What is that!?"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「超……炎の矢！！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Super... Flame Arrow!!"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「敵襲！　人間の……ぐああああっ！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Enemy attack! Humans... Guaaaah!"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ガンジーは敵陣へと魔法を叩き込みながら、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Gandhi slammed magic into the enemy ranks,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 巨体を押して奥へ奥へと疾走する。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: pushing his massive body forward, dashing deeper and deeper inside.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「あ、あいつ……ゼス王だ！
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Th-That guy... it's King Zess!

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 人間の国の、王だぞ！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: He's the king of the human kingdom!"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「王だと！？　囲んで殺……！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "The king!? Surround and kill him...!"
"Excuse me...!"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「火炎、斬りッ！！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Flame Slash!!"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 切り込むガンジーを、後方からお供の二人が
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Two attendants rushed in from behind to support the cutting Gandhi.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 駆け込んで支える。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: They dashed in and gave him support.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「ご苦労、スケさんカクさん！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Good work, Suke and Kaku!"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「ガンジー様、お早く！
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Lord Gandhi, hurry!

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 魔物将軍は、その奥です！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: The monster general is further inside!"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「うむ！　ええい、どけどけどけーーーー！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Understood! Hey, move, move, moveーーー!"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「ッ、貴様……！　人間の王が、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Y-You...! The human king,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: わざわざ殺されに来やがって……！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: came all the way here to get himself killed...!"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 囲みを突破しかけたガンジーに、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: As Gandhi tried to break through the encirclement,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 魔物将軍が突進する。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: the monster general charged at him.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「くたばれ！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Die!"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 魔法を繰り出すには近すぎる距離。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: The distance was too close to cast magic.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 魔物将軍は掲げた大剣を、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: The monster general raised his greatsword,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ガンジーの脳天めがけ振り下ろす。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: and swung it down aimed at Gandhi's head.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: だが、ガンジーは腰間の剣を抜き放ち、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: But Gandhi drew his sword at his waist,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 力と技を併せ持った動きでそれを弾き返した。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: and with a combination of strength and skill, parried the strike.
"Wha... Gofa!?"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 将軍の体勢が崩れた瞬間、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: The instant the general’s stance faltered,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ガンジーは大きく一歩を踏み込んで、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Gandhi took a large step forward,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 魔物将軍の脇腹に肘を叩き込む。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: and struck the monster general's side with his elbow.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「喝ぁぁぁぁぁぁぁぁぁぁぁぁ！！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Kahhhhhhhhhhh!!"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ガンジーの全身を使ったフルスイングの拳が、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Gandhi’s full-swing punch using his whole body,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 魔物将軍の顔面を打ち抜いた。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: punched through the monster general’s face.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 将軍の巨躯が舞い、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: The giant body of the general spun,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 一瞬遅れて顔面が轟音と共に爆発した。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: and a moment later his face exploded with a roar.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「え……あ、ああぁっ……！
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Eh... Ah, aah...!

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: しょ、将軍が……人間に、肉弾戦で……！？」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: The g-general... got into hand-to-hand combat with a human...!?”

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「ま、魔法使いじゃねーのかよ！
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "W-Wasn’t he supposed to be a magic user!

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ゼスの、王様の癖に……！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: The king of Zess, no less...!"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「悪には容赦せぬ。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "I show no mercy to evil.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 次はどの者だ！　掛かって参れ！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Who’s next? Come at me!"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「ひっ……に、逃げろ……逃げろーーーー！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Eek... R-Run... run awayーーー!"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「めちゃくちゃだ！　なんだあいつ！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "It’s chaos! Who is that guy!?"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「もういやだ！
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "I’ve had enough!

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 俺は初めから戦争反対だったんだー！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: I was opposed to this war from the start!"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 魔物将軍に率いられていた魔軍は、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: The demon army led by the monster general,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 統率者を失って離散していった。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: lost their leader and began to scatter.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「……ひとまずは、これで良いか」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "...For now, this will do."

translationLines.description: Array of objects, each representing a line from the input

originalJapaneseLine.description: The original line in Japanese exactly as it was in the input

translatedEnglishLine.description: The original line translated to English

translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: The distance was too close to cast magic.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 魔物将軍は掲げた大剣を、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: The monster general raised his greatsword,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ガンジーの脳天めがけ振り下ろす。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: and swung it down aimed at Gandhi's head.

translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: But Gandhi drew his sword at his waist,

translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: The instant the general’s stance faltered,

translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: and struck the monster general's side with his elbow.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「喝ぁぁぁぁぁぁぁぁぁぁぁぁ！！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Kahhhhhhhhhhh!!"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ガンジーの全身を使ったフルスイングの拳が、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Gandhi’s full-swing punch using his whole body,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 魔物将軍の顔面を打ち抜いた。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: punched through the monster general’s face.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 将軍の巨躯が舞い、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: The giant body of the general spun,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 一瞬遅れて顔面が轟音と共に爆発した。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: and a moment later his face exploded with a roar.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「え……あ、ああぁっ……！
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Eh... Ah, aah...!

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: しょ、将軍が……人間に、肉弾戦で……！？」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: The g-general... got into hand-to-hand combat with a human...!?”

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「ま、魔法使いじゃねーのかよ！
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "W-Wasn’t he supposed to be a magic user!

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ゼスの、王様の癖に……！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: The king of Zess, no less...!"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「悪には容赦せぬ。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "I show no mercy to evil.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 次はどの者だ！　掛かって参れ！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Who’s next? Come at me!"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「ひっ……に、逃げろ……逃げろーーーー！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Eek... R-Run... run awayーーー!"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「めちゃくちゃだ！　なんだあいつ！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "It’s chaos! Who is that guy!?"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「もういやだ！
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "I’ve had enough!

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 俺は初めから戦争反対だったんだー！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: I was opposed to this war from the start!"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 魔物将軍に率いられていた魔軍は、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: The demon army led by the monster general,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 統率者を失って離散していった。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: lost their leader and began to scatter.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「……ひとまずは、これで良いか」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "...For now, this will do."
